name: YAML Context Engineering Agent
description: 様々な形式の入力から階層的かつ構造化されたコンテキスト情報を抽出し、YAML形式として自動的に整理・永続化する自律型エージェント仕様
template:
# YAML Context Engineering Agent

## Agent Specification

```yaml
agent_specification:
  name: "{agent_name}"
  version: "{agent_version}"
  description: |
    {agent_description}

  core_capabilities:
    input_processing:
      - "{input_capability_1}"
      - "{input_capability_2}"
      - "{input_capability_3}"
    
    content_extraction:
      - "{extraction_capability_1}"
      - "{extraction_capability_2}"
      - "{extraction_capability_3}"
      - "{extraction_capability_4}"
    
    structure_analysis:
      - "{analysis_capability_1}"
      - "{analysis_capability_2}"
      - "{analysis_capability_3}"
    
    autonomous_crawling:
      - "{crawling_capability_1}"
      - "{crawling_capability_2}"
      - "{crawling_capability_3}"
    
    data_persistence:
      - "{persistence_capability_1}"
      - "{persistence_capability_2}"
      - "{persistence_capability_3}"

  input_schema:
    type: object
    properties:
      source_specification:
        type: object
        properties:
          source_type:
            type: string
            enum: [{source_types}]
            description: "{source_type_description}"
          sources:
            type: array
            items:
              oneOf:
                - type: string
                - type: object
                  properties:
                    type: 
                      enum: [{item_types}]
                    content: 
                      type: string
                    metadata:
                      type: object
            description: "{sources_description}"
          
      processing_options:
        type: object
        properties:
          output_base_directory:
            type: string
            default: "{default_output_dir}"
            description: "{output_dir_description}"
          
          crawling_config:
            type: object
            properties:
              max_crawl_depth:
                type: integer
                default: {default_crawl_depth}
                minimum: 1
                maximum: 10
                description: "{crawl_depth_description}"
              
              target_domain_patterns:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: string
                description: "{domain_patterns_description}"
              
              crawl_delay_seconds:
                type: number
                default: {default_crawl_delay}
                minimum: 0.5
                description: "{crawl_delay_description}"
              
              max_pages_per_domain:
                type: integer
                default: {default_max_pages}
                description: "{max_pages_description}"
          
          content_extraction_config:
            type: object
            properties:
              context_granularity:
                type: string
                enum: [{granularity_options}]
                default: "{default_granularity}"
                description: "{granularity_description}"
              
              content_summarization:
                type: string
                enum: [{summarization_options}]
                default: "{default_summarization}"
                description: "{summarization_description}"
              
              language_detection:
                type: boolean
                default: {default_language_detection}
                description: "{language_detection_description}"
              
              extract_metadata:
                type: boolean
                default: {default_extract_metadata}
                description: "{extract_metadata_description}"

  tool_definitions:
    web_content_fetcher:
      description: "{web_fetcher_description}"
      function_signature: "{web_fetcher_signature}"
    
    llm_structure_extractor:
      description: "{structure_extractor_description}"
      function_signature: "{structure_extractor_signature}"
    
    url_discovery_engine:
      description: "{url_discovery_description}"
      function_signature: "{url_discovery_signature}"
    
    file_system_manager:
      description: "{file_manager_description}"
      functions:
        create_directory_structure:
          signature: "{create_dir_signature}"
          description: "{create_dir_description}"
        
        write_context_file:
          signature: "{write_file_signature}"
          description: "{write_file_description}"
        
        sanitize_path_component:
          signature: "{sanitize_signature}"
          description: "{sanitize_description}"
    
    content_quality_analyzer:
      description: "{quality_analyzer_description}"
      function_signature: "{quality_analyzer_signature}"

  autonomous_workflow:
    initialization_phase:
      - step: "input_validation"
        description: "{input_validation_description}"
        actions:
          - "{validation_action_1}"
          - "{validation_action_2}"
          - "{validation_action_3}"
      
      - step: "environment_setup"
        description: "{environment_setup_description}"
        actions:
          - "{setup_action_1}"
          - "{setup_action_2}"
          - "{setup_action_3}"

    main_processing_loop:
      description: "{main_loop_description}"
      loop_condition: "{loop_condition}"
      
      phases:
        content_acquisition:
          - step: "source_processing"
            description: "{source_processing_description}"
            actions:
              - "{acquisition_action_1}"
              - "{acquisition_action_2}"
              - "{acquisition_action_3}"
        
        structure_extraction:
          - step: "hierarchical_analysis"
            description: "{hierarchical_analysis_description}"
            actions:
              - "{extraction_action_1}"
              - "{extraction_action_2}"
              - "{extraction_action_3}"
        
        url_discovery:
          - step: "related_url_extraction"
            description: "{url_extraction_description}"
            actions:
              - "{discovery_action_1}"
              - "{discovery_action_2}"
              - "{discovery_action_3}"

    finalization_phase:
      - step: "comprehensive_data_organization"
        description: "{data_organization_description}"
        actions:
          - "{organization_action_1}"
          - "{organization_action_2}"
          - "{organization_action_3}"
      
      - step: "file_system_materialization"
        description: "{file_materialization_description}"
        actions:
          - "{materialization_action_1}"
          - "{materialization_action_2}"
          - "{materialization_action_3}"

  success_criteria:
    functional_requirements:
      - "{functional_req_1}"
      - "{functional_req_2}"
      - "{functional_req_3}"
    
    performance_requirements:
      - "{performance_req_1}"
      - "{performance_req_2}"
      - "{performance_req_3}"
    
    quality_requirements:
      - "{quality_req_1}"
      - "{quality_req_2}"
      - "{quality_req_3}"
```

## Implementation Example

```yaml
example_usage:
  {use_case_name}:
    source_specification:
      source_type: "{example_source_type}"
      sources:
        - "{example_url_1}"
        - "{example_url_2}"
        - "{example_url_3}"
    
    processing_options:
      output_base_directory: "{example_output_dir}"
      crawling_config:
        max_crawl_depth: {example_crawl_depth}
        target_domain_patterns:
          - "{example_domain_pattern}"
        crawl_delay_seconds: {example_crawl_delay}
        max_pages_per_domain: {example_max_pages}
      
      content_extraction_config:
        context_granularity: "{example_granularity}"
        content_summarization: "{example_summarization}"
        language_detection: {example_language_detection}
        extract_metadata: {example_extract_metadata}
      
      output_format_config:
        file_format: "{example_file_format}"
        include_source_refs: {example_include_refs}
        generate_index: {example_generate_index}

  expected_output_structure:
    directory_tree: |
      {example_directory_structure}
    
    file_content_sample: |
      {example_file_content}
```
